disc.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a round flat shape or object
disc.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: three keys attached to a metal disc
disc.translation[0].definitions[2].defin: a record that you play on a record player
disc.translation[0].definitions[3].examp: The report form is available on disc from Personnel.
disc.translation[0].definitions[4].defin: a flat piece of cartilage between the bones of your back
disc.translation[0].definitions[4].examp: He retired early because of a slipped disc  (=one that has moved out of its correct place).
